title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the TransparentOKRDashboard project, including user stories, functional requirements, non-functional requirements, and any constraints or assumptions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the TransparentOKRDashboard, including the frontend, backend, and database components, as well as any necessary integrations with existing systems.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment for the project, including version control, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and any necessary development tools or frameworks.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services required for the TransparentOKRDashboard, including APIs for retrieving and updating OKR data, user authentication and authorization, and any other necessary services.

title: Implement Frontend User Interface
description: Develop the frontend user interface for the TransparentOKRDashboard, including components for displaying OKRs at various levels, user authentication and authorization, and any other necessary UI elements.

title: Design and Implement Database Schema
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing OKR data, user data, and any other necessary data for the TransparentOKRDashboard.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures for the TransparentOKRDashboard, including user authentication and authorization, data encryption, and any other necessary security measures.

title: Write Documentation
description: Write documentation for the TransparentOKRDashboard, including user guides, technical documentation, and any other necessary documentation.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Perform testing and quality assurance for the TransparentOKRDashboard, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy to Production
description: Deploy the TransparentOKRDashboard to the production environment, including any necessary configuration, data migration, and monitoring.
